original_text: And the priest shall take one of the male lambs and offer it for a guilt offering, along with the log of oil, and wave them for a wave offering before the Lord.
korean_text: 어린 숫양 한 마리를 가져다가 기름 한 록과 아울러 속건제로 드리되 여호와 앞에 흔들어 요제를 삼고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall take one of the male lambs
and offer it for a guilt offering
along with the log of oil
and wave them for a wave offering
